languages.text: "Стойкость убеждений, Муаран? Ты говоришь, что твое предназначение — защищать своих собратьев... тогда что же случилось с одним из них, кого ты послал к правительнице мон-кай до меня? Тем, чей {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}череп{/d} мон-кай сохранили в качестве безделушки? Это был предыдущий посланник, не так ли? Такую судьбу ты прозрел для меня в своих видениях?"

traits.locale_text: "Стойкость убеждений, Муаран? Ты говоришь, что твое предназначение — защищать своих собратьев... тогда что же случилось с одним из них, кого ты послал к правительнице мон-кай до меня? Тем, чей череп мон-кай сохранили в качестве безделушки? Это был предыдущий посланник, не так ли? Такую судьбу ты прозрел для меня в своих видениях?"

languages.text: "You speak of the strength of one's convictions, Muaran? You claim it is your destiny to protect your kin... so then what happened to the Aeldari you sent to the mon-keigh ruler before me? The Aeldari whose {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}skull{/d} is now kept as a mon-keigh trinket? That was the previous envoy you sent, wasn't it? Did you see the same fate for me in your visions?"
languages.original_text: "Стойкость убеждений, Муаран? Ты говоришь, что твое предназначение — защищать своих собратьев... тогда что же случилось с одним из них, кого ты послал к правительнице мон-кай до меня? Тем, чей {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}череп{/d} мон-кай сохранили в качестве безделушки? Это был предыдущий посланник, не так ли? Такую судьбу ты прозрел для меня в своих видениях?"

traits.locale_text: "You speak of the strength of one's convictions, Muaran? You claim it is your destiny to protect your kin... so then what happened to the Aeldari you sent to the mon-keigh ruler before me? The Aeldari whose skull is now kept as a mon-keigh trinket? That was the previous envoy you sent, wasn't it? Did you see the same fate for me in your visions?"

"You speak of the strength of one's convictions, Muaran? You claim it is your destiny to protect your kin... so then what happened to the Aeldari you sent to the mon-keigh ruler before me? The Aeldari whose skull is now kept as a mon-keigh trinket? That was the previous envoy you sent, wasn't it? Did you see the same fate for me in your visions?"

"You speak of the strength of one's convictions, Muaran? You claim it is your destiny to protect your kin... so then what happened to the Aeldari you sent to the mon-keigh ruler before me? The Aeldari whose skull is now kept as a mon-keigh trinket? That was the previous envoy you sent, wasn't it? Did you see the same fate for me in your visions?"

"You speak of the strength of one's convictions, Muaran? You claim it is your destiny to protect your kin... so then what happened to the Aeldari you sent to the mon-keigh ruler before me? The Aeldari whose skull is now kept as a mon-keigh trinket? That was the previous envoy you sent, wasn't it? Did you see the same fate for me in your visions?"

languages.text: “你居然还有脸说什么信念的力量，穆兰？你口口声声说，保护你的族人是你的命运……既然如此，在我之前，被你派到猴子统治者那里的灵族遭遇了什么事情？他的{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}头骨{/d}已经变成了那个猴子的饰品。他就是你派到那里的上一位特使，不是吗？你在你的幻景中，也看到了我会遭遇同样的命运吗？”
languages.original_text: "You speak of the strength of one's convictions, Muaran? You claim it is your destiny to protect your kin... so then what happened to the Aeldari you sent to the mon-keigh ruler before me? The Aeldari whose {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}skull{/d} is now kept as a mon-keigh trinket? That was the previous envoy you sent, wasn't it? Did you see the same fate for me in your visions?"

traits.locale_text: “你居然还有脸说什么信念的力量，穆兰？你口口声声说，保护你的族人是你的命运……既然如此，在我之前，被你派到猴子统治者那里的灵族遭遇了什么事情？他的头骨已经变成了那个猴子的饰品。他就是你派到那里的上一位特使，不是吗？你在你的幻景中，也看到了我会遭遇同样的命运吗？”

languages.text: 「信念の強さのことか、ムアラン？お前は同胞を守ることこそ自分の運命と主張する…それで、我の前にモン＝ケイの支配者に遣わされたアエルダリの身に何が起きた？今、モン＝ケイの装飾品になっているアエルダリの{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}頭蓋骨{/d}は誰のものだ？お前が遣わしたアエルダリの使者ではないか？お前には、我も同じ運命を辿る姿が見えていたのか？」
languages.original_text: "You speak of the strength of one's convictions, Muaran? You claim it is your destiny to protect your kin... so then what happened to the Aeldari you sent to the mon-keigh ruler before me? The Aeldari whose {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}skull{/d} is now kept as a mon-keigh trinket? That was the previous envoy you sent, wasn't it? Did you see the same fate for me in your visions?"

traits.locale_text: 「信念の強さのことか、ムアラン？お前は同胞を守ることこそ自分の運命と主張する…それで、我の前にモン＝ケイの支配者に遣わされたアエルダリの身に何が起きた？今、モン＝ケイの装飾品になっているアエルダリの{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}頭蓋骨{/d}は誰のものだ？お前が遣わしたアエルダリの使者ではないか？お前には、我も同じ運命を辿る姿が見えていたのか？」

languages.text: "Ihr sprecht von der Kraft der eigenen Überzeugungen, Muaran? Ihr behauptet, es sei Euer Schicksal, die Euren zu schützen ... was ist dann mit dem Aeldari geschehen, den Ihr vor mir zum Herrscher der Chem-Pan-Sey geschickt habt? Dem Aeldari, dessen {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}Schädel{/d} nun einem Chem-Pan-Sey als Schmuck dient? Das war doch der vorherige Vertreter, den Ihr entsendet habt, nicht wahr? Habt Ihr in Euren Visionen für mich dasselbe Schicksal gesehen?"
languages.original_text: "You speak of the strength of one's convictions, Muaran? You claim it is your destiny to protect your kin... so then what happened to the Aeldari you sent to the mon-keigh ruler before me? The Aeldari whose {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}skull{/d} is now kept as a mon-keigh trinket? That was the previous envoy you sent, wasn't it? Did you see the same fate for me in your visions?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sprecht von der Kraft der eigenen Überzeugungen, Muaran? Ihr behauptet, es sei Euer Schicksal, die Euren zu schützen ... was ist dann mit dem Aeldari geschehen, den Ihr vor mir zum Herrscher der Chem-Pan-Sey geschickt habt? Dem Aeldari, dessen Schädel nun einem Chem-Pan-Sey als Schmuck dient? Das war doch der vorherige Vertreter, den Ihr entsendet habt, nicht wahr? Habt Ihr in Euren Visionen für mich dasselbe Schicksal gesehen?"

languages.text: « Vous parlez de la force de nos convictions, Muaran ? Vous prétendez que votre destin est de protéger votre peuple... mais qu'est-il advenu de l'Aeldari que vous avez envoyé à la dirigeante des mon-keigh avant moi ? Celui dont le {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}crâne{/d} est devenu un vulgaire bibelot ? C'était votre émissaire précédent, n'est-ce pas ? Avez-vous vu la même chose m'arriver dans vos visions ? »
languages.original_text: "You speak of the strength of one's convictions, Muaran? You claim it is your destiny to protect your kin... so then what happened to the Aeldari you sent to the mon-keigh ruler before me? The Aeldari whose {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}skull{/d} is now kept as a mon-keigh trinket? That was the previous envoy you sent, wasn't it? Did you see the same fate for me in your visions?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous parlez de la force de nos convictions, Muaran ? Vous prétendez que votre destin est de protéger votre peuple... mais qu'est-il advenu de l'Aeldari que vous avez envoyé à la dirigeante des mon-keigh avant moi ? Celui dont le crâne est devenu un vulgaire bibelot ? C'était votre émissaire précédent, n'est-ce pas ? Avez-vous vu la même chose m'arriver dans vos visions ? »

languages.text: «¿Hablas de la firmeza de las convicciones? Insistes en que tu destino es proteger a los nuestros... ¿Qué fue entonces del anterior Aeldari que enviaste contra la gobernante mon-keigh? ¿El Aeldari cuyo {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}cráneo{/d} es ahora un abalorio mon-keigh? Ese fue tu anterior emisario, ¿no es así? ¿Auguraste el mismo final para mí en tus visiones?».
languages.original_text: "You speak of the strength of one's convictions, Muaran? You claim it is your destiny to protect your kin... so then what happened to the Aeldari you sent to the mon-keigh ruler before me? The Aeldari whose {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}skull{/d} is now kept as a mon-keigh trinket? That was the previous envoy you sent, wasn't it? Did you see the same fate for me in your visions?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Hablas de la firmeza de las convicciones? Insistes en que tu destino es proteger a los nuestros... ¿Qué fue entonces del anterior Aeldari que enviaste contra la gobernante mon-keigh? ¿El Aeldari cuyo cráneo es ahora un abalorio mon-keigh? Ese fue tu anterior emisario, ¿no es así? ¿Auguraste el mismo final para mí en tus visiones?».

languages.text: "Sen mi sözün samimiyetinden bahsediyorsun Muaran? Soydaşlarını korumanın kaderinde yazılı olduğunu iddia ediyorsun... O hâlde benden önce mon-keighlerin hükümdarına gönderdiğin Aeldari'nin başına ne geldi? Artık {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}kafatası{/d} mon-keighlerin elinde oyuncak olan o Aeldari değil mi? Önceden gönderdiğin temsilci o değil miydi? Görülerinde benim için de aynı kaderi mi gördün?"
languages.original_text: "You speak of the strength of one's convictions, Muaran? You claim it is your destiny to protect your kin... so then what happened to the Aeldari you sent to the mon-keigh ruler before me? The Aeldari whose {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_YrlietShownSkull}skull{/d} is now kept as a mon-keigh trinket? That was the previous envoy you sent, wasn't it? Did you see the same fate for me in your visions?"

traits.locale_text: "Sen mi sözün samimiyetinden bahsediyorsun Muaran? Soydaşlarını korumanın kaderinde yazılı olduğunu iddia ediyorsun... O hâlde benden önce mon-keighlerin hükümdarına gönderdiğin Aeldari'nin başına ne geldi? Artık kafatası mon-keighlerin elinde oyuncak olan o Aeldari değil mi? Önceden gönderdiğin temsilci o değil miydi? Görülerinde benim için de aynı kaderi mi gördün?"
